Kilesa Sutta：1．Kilesa Sutta．-The five kinds of alloy which are used with gold - iron，copper，tin，lead and silver - and the similar five corruptions of the heart - sensual desire，malevolence，sloth and torpor，excitement and worry，doubt and wavering （S．v．92f）．



2．Kilesa Sutta．-The seven bojjhangas lead to liberation by knowledge （S．v．93）．
